articles.title: Researchers find coronavirus was circulating in Italy earlier than thought - Reuters
articles.description: The new coronavirus was circulating in Italy in September 2019, a study by the National Cancer Institute (INT) of the Italian city of Milan shows, signaling that it might have spread beyond China earlier than thought.
